item.title: New York Gov. Hochul won't remove Mayor Eric Adams 'at this time'
item.description: The DOJ is seeking to dismiss its criminal case against Eric Adams, citing the need for the mayor's cooperation on Trump immigration policies.

item.title: Who is Friedrich Merz, the favorite to become Germany's new chancellor?

item.title: Palantir plunges after CEO Karp changes share sales plan, Pentagon budget cut report
item.description: The Trump administration is engaged in a wide-ranging effort to slash government spending and reduce the number of federal workers.

item.title: Trump expects visit from Chinese President Xi without giving timeline
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump said Wednesday he expected Chinese President Xi Jinping to visit the United States, though he did not say when.

item.title: Pentagon orders budget revamp to redirect $50 billion toward Trump's defense priorities
